title: "ZOMG I FINISHED IN CHALLENJOUR WENT 11/-1 IN PLACEMENTS AND GOT BRONZE VII RIOT WTF FIX NOW"
body:
Seriously, can we just stop with these threads? It happens literally every year, and it's almost always people who either climb back hilariously quickly or clearly didn't deserve their rank in the first place.

Also remember that your win/loss isn't necessarily meaningful. If you won 8 games against the literal worst player ever and then lost two games against silver players, then you're probably going to end up in bronze.

replies.body: You don't understand how it feels to be low elo and drop rank. You've worked all year for that Silver 3 and now you are placed in Bronze. There goes another year of grinding for that sweet sweet silver.

> [{quoted}](name=HEAljvLykd,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KNXEHPeG,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-01-21T23:22:48.816+0000)
>
> You don't understand how it feels to be low elo and drop rank. You've worked all year for that Silver 3 and now you are placed in Bronze. There goes another year of grinding for that sweet sweet silver.

I've been in bronze, worked up to silver, and then been placed in bronze again.

Then I decided to actually learn to play and got g1.

> [{quoted}](name=Vortices,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KNXEHPeG,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-01-21T23:23:52.345+0000)
>
> I've been in bronze, worked up to silver, and then been placed in bronze again.
> 
> Then I decided to actually learn to play and got g1.

Learning to play? What a waste of time. You can climb faster blaming teammates than learning how to play. Noob.

> [{quoted}](name=HEAljvLykd,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KNXEHPeG,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2016-01-21T23:26:01.160+0000)
>
> Learning to play? What a waste of time. You can climb faster blaming teammates then learning how to play. Noob.

oh ya noob team wtf stuck in bronze cuz noob team idk how to get out uv bronze i go 10/10 on support wukong everygame and i always get my deathcap first noob team r noob wtf
Now you're getting it! Challenger here you come!
What would you know about it bronze pleb. Jk, we should play later when I get off work.

I'll have you know I'm an unranked pleb, which I wouldn't even be if my stupid noob teammates stopped all feeding and doing things that are really stupid that I never do but they keep dragging me down and it's not fair this ranked system sucks I'm going to sue Rito. That and off meta picks, what kind of idiot would take _Yorick_ bot?

SAME!!! I'm always losing because of my bad teammates. Even though I play AD Leblanc jungle, they just go "Lucian adc" like WTF everyone knows Lucian is a toplaner, and why the actual fluck would he build essence reaver???? U build randuin's so you can 1v1 their support Janna.
Fluck this noob team. GG

https://encrypted-tbn1.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQKtDC0RPOch77rZ3rJ1-YCTb45GDx-8o5E81_AwAyNujsP7dhn
http://oi65.tinypic.com/10d7390.jpg
op
Whole system needs a rework. More placement matches etc... WoW always did a complete reset pvp season to pvp season. The issue is with the brackets, it should only be MMR driven, ggwp.

> [{quoted}](name=Grashnim,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KNXEHPeG,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-01-21T23:10:22.384+0000)
>
> Whole system needs a rework. More placement matches etc... WoW always did a complete reset pvp season to pvp season. The issue is with the brackets, it should only be MMR driven, ggwp.

Everyone seems to think that a full mmr reset would benefit them in some way. It wouldn't. The reason they don't do one is mostly so that there aren't two weeks of plat and diamond players roflstomping bronzies.

> [{quoted}](name=Vortices,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KNXEHPeG,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-01-21T23:12:35.161+0000)
>
> Everyone seems to think that a full mmr reset would benefit them in some way. It wouldn't. The reason they don't do one is mostly so that there aren't two weeks of plat and diamond players roflstomping bronzies.

Sometimes you need to know the difference in player skill to appreciate why you were ranked what you were?

> [{quoted}](name=Grashnim,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KNXEHPeG,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-01-21T23:13:26.531+0000)
>
> Sometimes you need to know the difference in player skill to appreciate why you were ranked what you were?

Yeah, but what if you just want to get into a game and play against equally skilled opponents?

Trust me, if it happened people would be complaining about it everywhere.
It did happen until season 2 or 3 where they did a literal hard reset of 1200 and people did not shut up and it was fun for no one.

I dunno.
It was probably fun for sadists and/or masochists

> [{quoted}](name=Vortices,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KNXEHPeG,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-21T23:14:30.707+0000)
>
> Yeah, but what if you just want to get into a game and play against equally skilled opponents?
> 
> Trust me, if it happened people would be complaining about it everywhere.

People complain either way, lol. See the million and one posts about it already. In essence, sometimes you have to try something different.

> [{quoted}](name=Grashnim,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KNXEHPeG,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-21T23:45:56.765+0000)
>
> People complain either way, lol. See the million and one posts about it already. In essence, sometimes you have to try something different.

Yeah, but one of them means that you have to play a few games against slightly worse players, and one means that a bunch of newer players get placed in completely unwinnable games.
That's the way it is anyways

except right now there are challengers and masters playing with actual season 5 plat and diamond 5 players. the system is completely broken right now. once i hit plat 1 on my smurf im stopping because id rather not play with challengers to prove im worthy of diamond.
I'll have you know I paid good money for my diamond rank and I'm not going to stand by while Riot steals that from me! They'll be hearing from my lawyers.
How much did you have to pay XWX for that diamond rank?
$50, but after all of my pain and mental suffering my bill to Riot will be approximately $5,000,050. Plus legal fees of course.
Hey man i went 8-2 and got bronze 2 from gold xD i dont deserve this shit

> [{quoted}](name=Teenage Riven,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KNXEHPeG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-21T23:06:13.524+0000)
>
> Hey man i went 8-2 and got bronze 2 from gold xD i dont deserve this shit

Your MMR was worse than shit if you went 8-2 and got placed Bronze. You should have no problem skyrocketing to Gold if that was your real MMR and you weren't boosted.

> [{quoted}](name=Neo Cyrus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KNXEHPeG,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-01-22T02:53:16.242+0000)
>
> Your MMR was worse than shit if you went 8-2 and got placed Bronze. You should have no problem skyrocketing to Gold if that was your real MMR and you weren't boosted.

So now i am boosted? k And its going to be hard solo qing and not doign duos. trolls are everywere in bronze and its cancer legit already had afkers and intent feeders 3 straight i cant carry intent feeders lol

Man
Just reading that title gave me a small head ache, the obnoxious levels are off the charts. Anyway good post. +1

there is a difference between a soft reset and a hard reset you know? soft resets shouldn't drop your rank by that much, 2~3 divisions at most not up to 2 whole tiers that's what a hard reset would do. Riot said they would do a soft reset but looking at these threads it seems more like they did a hard reset instead
If someone had a low mmr for their rank that would be why.

> [{quoted}](name=LittleBlast,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KNXEHPeG,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-01-22T01:37:29.714+0000)
>
> If someone had a low mmr for their rank that would be why.

i have seen pro players who were in challenger drop all the way down to plat. That is not "having low MMR" that is Riot telling us lies about them doing a soft reset when in reality they did a hard reset
Iirc plat is the highest you can be placed
A hard reset would set everyone to the same mmr no matter what their mmr last season was. Anything less than that is a soft reset of varying degree.
The placements don't matter this season. They go more based off last season's MMR.
+1 for Bronze Seven.

Was Silver II last season.
Ended up Bronze II ... which i'm happy with.

Means I dropped a division but that was going to happen even if I had a perfect 10 out of 10 games. Time to climb out. Wish me luck, i'm aiming for Gold man. Aiming. For. The. Gold.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
right there with you.

I think I have to agree.. If you belong somewhere, you will get there. If you win 10/10 and placing in B5, your MMR must have just been that low. If one claims they don't belong there well, then they can easily climb out. 

I worked my butt off getting to Plat form Gold (a nonstop 5 months, about 6 hours a day). Then I played for about a month in plat and then stopped because I was satisfied with my rank... I experienced decay and dropped to Gold 4. I wanted my border reward so badly that I decided to play again. In just 2 weeks I was back in Plat. Which confirmed to me that this is where I belonged now. If I didn't I probably wouldn't have made the climb to G1 and be successful in series again.

Yeah this season is jacked.
I was silvr 2 when S5 ended. I won 8/10 placements, my last 2 games were 9/2/2 and 18/5/5
I got placed in silver 5

Last season when i did placements I got 7/10 wins, and was placed in silver 3.....

4/10, Silver 4. 

The Ranked system makes no sense.
lol im pretty sure you're still in the division you belong in. atleast u werent plat 5 season 5 win 7/3 in placements and get placed in silver 2. you cant explain that.

No no, I wasn't saying that I deserve to be any higher.

What I forgot to mention was that it was my first season ever playing ranked, so I had no prior history to have landed in Silver in the first place, let alone landing in Silver from losing a majority of the promos.
Nah I'd rather have RIOT fix their shit. I know for a fact what I did in these placements had a great kda and kill percentage and still got stuck in b5 so yea I'll continue to complain

I know that a lot of these threads seem like mindless complaining, but I was plat III and I had placement match of 7-3, but I was placed in gold IV, thats a tier and division lower. A lot of people are getting whole tiers lower and thats the problem.

noooooooooooooooooooooooooooo dude I had to carry my games by my own, got trolls on 4 of the 10 games, last seasson ended on Silver 4 and now ended in Bronze 5???? I mean I new I would end in B, but 5??? cmon Riot needs to do something.{{item:3151}}

was GOLD 3 last season with 60lp with an average mmr of 1490

just did my 10 placements and went 9-1 got S3

somebody reply why!!!

why did I get this rank

Mocking someone's complaint doesn't in any way minimize it's truthfulness.  8/2, ended in silver, CARRIED many of those games, including pulling off two 4v5 wins, and placed in bronze 5.  Fine, whatever, yes I can get back to silver.  I'm not overly worried about that.  But as far as I'm concerned, the system IS broken.  It doesn't place people in the right spot.  You REALLY feel confident that it does, Riot?  Then next year, do a full reset.  I mean, it's certainly been enough years.  Or better yet, SELL full resets.  You charge $50 for fresh placements, and you'll make more of a killing than you already do.  Limit it to one purchase a year, to prevent abuse, and there ya go.

Wish people would understand that there is a reset and your current rank doesn't mean much at all. Like I was gold 5 dropped to silver 5 and everyone I play with is between silver 4 and bronze 1 and almost all of them are ex gold players... with some silver 1s or 2s. Current rank says silver 5... but really its more around gold 5 and everyone you are playing is around that elo. Ranks only start to matter once players have played 50 +  games or something like that, so just give it a couple of months.
8-2 BRONZE 5 :D
